data_sharing.justification: Reasoning based on policies about sharing data with third parties.

admin_management.justification: Reasoning based on the availability of enterprise admin dashboards, roles, etc.

audit_capabilities.justification: Reasoning based on the availability of audit logs and user activity tracking.
